action_upgrade_base_attack_quick.name: Quick Base Attack
action_upgrade_base_attack_quick.description: Allows the Base Attack action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_dodge_quick.name: Quick Dodge
action_upgrade_dodge_quick.description: Allows the Dodge action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_brace_quick.name: Quick Brace
action_upgrade_brace_quick.description: Allows the Brace action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_fortify_quick.name: Quick Fortify
action_upgrade_fortify_quick.description: Allows the Fortify action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_aim_quick.name: Quick Aim
action_upgrade_aim_quick.description: Allows the Aim action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_empower_quick.name: Quick Empower
action_upgrade_empower_quick.description: Allows the Empower action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_refine_quick.name: Quick Refine
action_upgrade_refine_quick.description: Allows the Refine action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_assist_quick.name: Quick Assist
action_upgrade_assist_quick.description: Allows the Assist action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_assist_enhanced.name: Enhanced Assist
action_upgrade_assist_enhanced.description: Range increased to 15 spaces and you can target multiple allies up to your Communication or Intelligence score.

action_upgrade_carry_quick.name: Quick Carry
action_upgrade_carry_quick.description: Allows the Carry action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_carry_enhanced.name: Effortless Carry
action_upgrade_carry_enhanced.description: No movement speed penalty. Once you've taken this action once on a turn, you can continue to reuse it for free until the end of this turn.

action_upgrade_protect_quick.name: Quick Protect
action_upgrade_protect_quick.description: Allows the Protect action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_protect_enhanced.name: Guardian
action_upgrade_protect_enhanced.description: You can protect all adjacent allies simultaneously and gain extra reactions equal to half your Tier (rounded up) to use only for the Protect Action.

action_upgrade_use_quick.name: Quick Use
action_upgrade_use_quick.description: Allows the Use action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_hasten_quick.name: Quick Hasten
action_upgrade_hasten_quick.description: Allows the Hasten action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_hide_quick.name: Quick Hide
action_upgrade_hide_quick.description: Allows the Hide action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_prepare_quick.name: Quick Prepare
action_upgrade_prepare_quick.description: Allows the Prepare action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

archetype_movement_swift.name: Swift
archetype_movement_swift.description: Movement speed increased by half your Tier (rounded up). Traverse the battlefield quicker.

archetype_movement_skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
archetype_movement_skirmisher.description: Does not trigger Punish Attacks for moving. +1 space melee attack reach. Maneuver through enemy lines freely.

archetype_movement_behemoth.name: Behemoth
archetype_movement_behemoth.description: Cannot be Grabbed, Moved, knocked Prone, or Stunned. Consistent positioning regardless of enemy interference.

effects.display: Immune to forced movement and stun

archetype_movement_vanguard.name: Vanguard
archetype_movement_vanguard.description: Enemies that start their turn next to you have their movement speed halved until the start of their next turn. As part of a reaction Punish attack, you may move up to your full movement speed towards the target until the end of their turn. Enhanced zone control and battlefield presence.

archetype_attackType_singleTarget.name: Single Target
archetype_attackType_singleTarget.description: Gain Melee AND Ranged attack types for 0p. Specializes in single-target elimination. The most versatile combat approach.

archetype_attackType_aoeSpecialist.name: AOE Specialist
archetype_attackType_aoeSpecialist.description: Gain AOE attack type for 0p. Excels at crowd control and managing multiple targets. Weaker than single target but hits many.

archetype_attackType_directSpecialist.name: Direct Specialist
archetype_attackType_directSpecialist.description: Gain Direct attack type for 0p. Provides reliable effect delivery that cannot be dodged. Perfect for consistent results.

archetype_effectType_damageSpecialist.name: Damage Specialist
archetype_effectType_damageSpecialist.description: Focus purely on dealing damage for maximum potential. Can still use Basic Conditions as separate attacks.

archetype_effectType_hybridSpecialist.name: Hybrid Specialist
archetype_effectType_hybridSpecialist.description: All attacks MUST combine damage and conditions. A versatile but less powerful approach in each aspect.

archetype_effectType_crowdControl.name: Crowd Control
archetype_effectType_crowdControl.description: Free access to 2 Advanced condition effects (chosen at selection), but suffer -Tier to all Damage rolls. Specializes in enemy control and debilitation, a strong team support role.

archetype_uniqueAbility_versatileMaster.name: Versatile Master
archetype_uniqueAbility_versatileMaster.description: Gain 2 Quick Actions per turn. When you select this archetype or advance Tiers, select a number of Primary Actions equal to half your Tier rounded up. You can use each of those Primary Actions as Quick Actions. At Tier 8, gain a third Quick Action.

effects.display: Gain extra Quick Actions and convert Primary Actions

archetype_uniqueAbility_extraordinary.name: Extraordinary
archetype_uniqueAbility_extraordinary.description: Gain an additional (Tier - 2) × 15 points added to your main pool. You can only spend up to (Tier - 2) × 15 points on Flaws or Traits. Ideal for characters specializing in Unique Abilities.

archetype_uniqueAbility_cutAbove.name: Cut Above
archetype_uniqueAbility_cutAbove.description: Gain universal stat bonuses to all core stats: Accuracy, Damage, Conditions, Avoidance, Durability, Resistances, Initiative, and Movement. Tiers 1-4: +1 | Tiers 5-7: +2 | Tiers 8+: +3.

effects.display: +1/+2/+3 to all stats based on Tier

archetype_defensive_stalwart.name: Stalwart
archetype_defensive_stalwart.description: Subtract your Tier from your Avoidance Score. Choose Physical OR Non-Physical damage: you take half damage from that type. Provides specialized damage resistance.

archetype_defensive_fortress.name: Fortress
archetype_defensive_fortress.description: Add your Tier again to Durability. Provides consistent protection against all damage.

archetype_defensive_resilient.name: Resilient
archetype_defensive_resilient.description: Add your Tier to all three Secondary Resistances (Resolve, Stability, Vitality). Makes you exceptionally good at resisting condition effects.

archetype_defensive_immutable.name: Immutable
archetype_defensive_immutable.description: Choose one Secondary Resistance type to gain complete immunity to it. An unshakeable defense against specific attacks.

archetype_defensive_juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
archetype_defensive_juggernaut.description: Increase your maximum Health Pool by 5 × Tier. Provides extra health reserves for attrition warfare.

archetype_specialAttack_normal.name: Normal
archetype_specialAttack_normal.description: Select 3 Specialty Upgrades at half cost. Limits provide Points × (Tier ÷ 6). Allows maximum customization flexibility.

archetype_specialAttack_specialist.name: Specialist
archetype_specialAttack_specialist.description: All limits selected must be applied to all attacks. Limits provide Points × (Tier ÷ 3). A higher return for a restricted playstyle.

requirements.display: All attacks must use the same 3 limits

archetype_specialAttack_paragon.name: Paragon
archetype_specialAttack_paragon.description: Each special attack receives 10 × Tier points. Cannot take Limits. Provides consistent performance without drawbacks.

archetype_specialAttack_oneTrick.name: One Trick
archetype_specialAttack_oneTrick.description: You can only create a single attack, but it gets Tier × 20 points. Cannot take Limits. High-risk, high-reward specialization.

archetype_specialAttack_straightforward.name: Straightforward
archetype_specialAttack_straightforward.description: Choose a single Limit to apply to all attacks. That Limit returns Points × (Tier ÷ 2). A simple but effective approach.

archetype_specialAttack_sharedUses.name: Shared Uses
archetype_specialAttack_sharedUses.description: You have 10 shared uses among abilities, and each attack costs 1-3 uses. Regenerate 1 Use per turn. Gain a Tier × 5 point discount per use cost. Cannot take Limits.

archetype_specialAttack_dualNatured.name: Dual-Natured
archetype_specialAttack_dualNatured.description: You can create two distinct Special Attacks, and each gets 15 × Tier points. Cannot take Limits. A balanced and versatile option.

archetype_specialAttack_basic.name: Basic
archetype_specialAttack_basic.description: Gain Tier × 10 points for base attack improvements only. No special attacks can be created. Good for builds that rely on their base attack.

archetype_utility_specialized.name: Specialized
archetype_utility_specialized.description: Gain double Tier bonus for one chosen core stat. Cannot purchase additional Expertise.

effects.display: Tier x 2 bonus to a chosen core stat

archetype_utility_practical.name: Practical
archetype_utility_practical.description: Select 3 skills to gain proficiency in, each granting a 2 x Tier bonus to checks.

archetype_utility_jackOfAllTrades.name: Jack of All Trades
archetype_utility_jackOfAllTrades.description: Adds Tier bonus to ALL skill checks. Cannot purchase specialized Expertise.

attribute_combat_focus.name: Focus
attribute_combat_focus.description: *"Aim true, act fast."*\n\nRepresents your character's precision, fighting skill, and mental fortitude. It improves `Accuracy` for all attacks, increases `Initiative`, and boosts `Resolve` score against mental and psychic effects.

attribute_combat_mobility.name: Mobility
attribute_combat_mobility.description: *"Can't hit what isn't there."*\n\nGoverns physical agility, speed, and evasiveness. It increases your base `Movement` speed, boosts `Avoidance` score, and improves `Initiative`.

attribute_combat_power.name: Power
attribute_combat_power.description: *"Hit hard, leave a mark."*\n\nThe raw force of your abilities. It directly increases your base `Damage`, boosts your `Conditions` check, and increases `Stability` score.

attribute_combat_endurance.name: Endurance
attribute_combat_endurance.description: *"Outlast them all."*\n\nRepresents physical resilience and stamina. It significantly boosts `Durability`, increases `Vitality` score, and contributes to Survival Checks.

attribute_utility_awareness.name: Awareness
attribute_utility_awareness.description: *"Nothing escapes your notice."*\n\nRepresents your perception and intuition. It improves `Initiative` and is the core stat for `Perception`, `Tracking`, and `Sense Motive` skill checks.

attribute_utility_communication.name: Communication
attribute_utility_communication.description: *"Words are your sharpest weapon."*\n\nThe ability to influence, deceive, or inspire others. It governs all social skill checks like `Persuasion`, `Deception`, and `Intimidation`.

attribute_utility_intelligence.name: Intelligence
attribute_utility_intelligence.description: *"Knowledge is power."*\n\nRepresents logic, reasoning, and problem-solving. It governs `Knowledge`, `Crafting`, `Research`, and `Strategy` checks.

boon_simple_psychic.name: Psychic
boon_simple_psychic.description: All conditions you inflict target Resolve resistance

boon_simple_robot.name: Robot
boon_simple_robot.description: Immune to most Vitality and Resolve conditions, vulnerable to Hacking/Electricity

boon_simple_telekinetic.name: Telekinetic
boon_simple_telekinetic.description: All conditions you inflict target Stability resistance

boon_simple_biohacker.name: Biohacker
boon_simple_biohacker.description: All conditions you inflict target Vitality resistance

boon_simple_utilitarian.name: Utilitarian
boon_simple_utilitarian.description: Gain 5 extra points for Expertise, Features, Senses, and Descriptors

boon_simple_perfectionist.name: Perfectionist
boon_simple_perfectionist.description: Reroll any natural 1s on d20 rolls

character_type_player_character.name: Player Character
character_type_player_character.description: A unique, player-controlled character with a full range of abilities.

character_type_npc_ally.name: NPC Ally
character_type_npc_ally.description: A friendly non-player character that assists the party.

character_type_other.name: Other
character_type_other.description: Select a specific character type from the sub-categories.

character_type_minion.name: Minion
character_type_minion.description: A standard, non-unique character. Typically found in groups and defeated easily.

character_type_captain.name: Captain
character_type_captain.description: A more durable character that often leads minions. A moderate threat.

character_type_vanguard.name: Vanguard
character_type_vanguard.description: A powerful and resilient character, a significant threat on the battlefield.

character_type_boss.name: Boss
character_type_boss.description: A major antagonist with a large health pool and unique, dangerous abilities.

condition_basic_disarm.name: Disarm
condition_basic_disarm.description: Forces the target to drop something they're holding. The dropped item can be picked up as a Quick Action. You may attempt to launch the item in any direction a number of spaces equal to how successful your roll was assuming you have the Capacity to move it.

condition_basic_grab.name: Grab
condition_basic_grab.description: The target cannot move. As an Action, the target can make a Stability check against the Condition roll to break free early, or as part of their movement to drag you with them following the rules for Capacity.

condition_basic_shove.name: Shove
condition_basic_shove.description: Push or pull the target a number of spaces equal to (Condition roll - Resistance). Collisions deal falling damage to both entities and you can expend 5 shoving spaces to knock the target prone.

condition_basic_prone.name: Prone
condition_basic_prone.description: Adjacent attacks against you gain +Tier to Accuracy, ranged attacks against you suffer -Tier to Accuracy. Standing costs 3 movement spaces.

condition_basic_blind.name: Blind
condition_basic_blind.description: Target treats all others as visually Hidden. Hidden attackers ignore the target's base Tier Avoidance bonus. When attacking, you must roll a Perception check vs the target's Stealth check; the attack is assumed to have missed on a failure.

condition_basic_daze.name: Daze
condition_basic_daze.description: Target cannot take Quick Actions or Reactions.

condition_basic_setup.name: Setup
condition_basic_setup.description: The next Accuracy check against the target adds double your Tier to their regular bonus.

condition_basic_taunt.name: Taunt
condition_basic_taunt.description: Target suffers a reduction to their Accuracy checks equal to double your Tier against all targets other than you.

condition_advanced_control.name: Control
condition_advanced_control.description: You control the target on their next turn. Common uses are making them attack, protect you, or become Stunned. If you or an ally attack them, the Control ends.

condition_advanced_stun.name: Stun
condition_advanced_stun.description: The target can take no actions or movement, their Avoidance is reduced to 0, and any attacks that hit them are considered critical hits.

condition_advanced_weaken.name: Weaken
condition_advanced_weaken.description: Reduce the chosen stat by your Tier: Accuracy, Damage, Conditions, Avoidance, Durability, or All Resistances. This effect does not expire, but the target cannot be affected by more than one instance of Weaken.

condition_advanced_frighten.name: Frighten
condition_advanced_frighten.description: The target must move away from you and can only take the Hasten or Hide Actions. If there is nowhere to run or hide, they may take the Dodge or Brace Actions.

condition_advanced_frenzy.name: Frenzy
condition_advanced_frenzy.description: Target attacks the nearest character indiscriminately.

descriptor_elemental_fire.name: Fire
descriptor_elemental_fire.description: Utility Applications: Make Intelligence checks to forge materials without tools, melt locks, create emergency lighting, or purify contaminated substances through controlled burning. Environmental Control: Make Intelligence checks to regulate temperature in buildings, melt ice barriers, or create smoke signals visible for miles. Detection: Make Awareness checks to sense heat sources through walls, track warm-blooded creatures, or identify recent fires. Crafting: Make Intelligence checks to work glass, ceramics, or metals with precision using controlled flame. Resistance: Immune to heat-based damage and environmental effects from extreme temperatures.

descriptor_elemental_water.name: Water
descriptor_elemental_water.description: Utility Applications: Make Intelligence checks to purify contaminated water sources, create ice tools/weapons, or navigate underwater environments. Environmental Control: Make Intelligence checks to create fog banks for concealment, redirect waterways, or cause/stop precipitation. Detection: Make Awareness checks to locate water sources underground, sense moisture levels, or track creatures through wet environments. Life Support: Make Intelligence checks to extract moisture from air in deserts or create breathable air pockets underwater. Resistance: Immune to drowning and pressure effects underwater.

descriptor_elemental_earth.name: Earth
descriptor_elemental_earth.description: Utility Applications: Make Intelligence checks to locate mineral deposits, create stone tools/barriers, or navigate underground. Environmental Control: Make Intelligence checks to create earthquakes, shape landscape, or reinforce structures. Detection: Make Awareness checks to sense vibrations through the ground, locate underground spaces, or identify geological instabilities. Construction: Make Intelligence checks to shape stone into precise architectural forms or create permanent fortifications. Resistance: Immune to crushing damage and effects from unstable terrain.

descriptor_elemental_air.name: Air
descriptor_elemental_air.description: Utility Applications: Make Intelligence checks to create updrafts for assisted flight, carry messages via wind, or clear toxic gases. Environmental Control: Make Intelligence checks to create localized weather patterns, disperse crowds with wind, or amplify/muffle sounds. Detection: Make Awareness checks to track scents across great distances, overhear distant conversations, or sense air pressure changes. Navigation: Make Awareness checks to determine wind patterns for sailing/flying or predict weather changes. Resistance: Immune to suffocation and airborne toxins.

descriptor_elemental_lightning.name: Lightning
descriptor_elemental_lightning.description: Utility Applications: Make Intelligence checks to power electronic devices, create precise electrical discharges, or generate electromagnetic fields. Environmental Control: Make Intelligence checks to disrupt electronics, create localized storms, or generate light displays. Detection: Make Awareness checks to sense electrical activity, track electronic devices, or identify electrical malfunctions. Communication: Make Intelligence checks to transmit messages through electrical networks or interfere with communications. Resistance: Immune to electrical damage and electromagnetic interference.

descriptor_elemental_ice.name: Ice
descriptor_elemental_ice.description: Utility Applications: Make Intelligence checks to preserve materials indefinitely, create precise ice constructs, or generate subzero environments. Environmental Control: Make Intelligence checks to freeze liquids instantly, create slippery surfaces, or generate protective barriers. Detection: Make Awareness checks to sense temperature variations, track warm creatures in cold environments, or identify frozen substances. Construction: Make Intelligence checks to create temporary ice structures or reinforce existing materials with ice. Resistance: Immune to cold damage and hypothermia effects.

descriptor_energy_kinetic.name: Kinetic
descriptor_energy_kinetic.description: Combat Enhancement: Enhance the force of moving objects, turning a pebble into a deadly projectile or a thrown spear into a devastating missile. Movement: Ignore impediments like mud, snow, or rubble, maintaining momentum without slowing. Defense: Absorb kinetic energy from impacts and transfer it elsewhere, such as reversing the force back to an attacker. Mobility: Defy gravity temporarily, running on walls or maintaining footing on impossibly narrow surfaces. Resistance: Immune to falling damage and impact-based effects.

descriptor_energy_plasma.name: Plasma
descriptor_energy_plasma.description: Environmental Control: Surround yourself with glowing plasma, providing light and damaging nearby enemies with searing heat. Detection: Detect the presence of plasma generators, power sources, or active weapons within a wide radius. Utility Applications: Manipulate plasma-like materials to weld, seal, or fuse objects permanently. Energy Mastery: Make Intelligence checks to generate controlled plasma discharges or manipulate existing plasma fields. Resistance: Withstand high-energy environments, including intense radiation or plasma discharges.

descriptor_specialized_biological.name: Biological
descriptor_specialized_biological.description: Regeneration: Heal from significant injuries and lost limbs or organs relatively quickly. Toxin Mastery: Identify, neutralize, or create potent toxins and antidotes instinctively. Highly resistant to toxins, diseases, and biological effects. Animal Connection: Form deep connections with animals, influencing their actions and understanding their emotions. Plant Revival: Revive withered plants by touch, causing them to grow rapidly, even in barren environments. Resistance: Immune to diseases, toxins, and biological manipulation.

descriptor_specialized_technology.name: Technology
descriptor_specialized_technology.description: Machine Communication: Communicate with machines as though they were sentient, intuitively diagnosing malfunctions or errors. Decryption: Make Intelligence checks to decode encrypted data or bypass advanced security systems. Remote Control: Remotely interact with and control electronic systems, such as locking or unlocking doors, or rerouting power. System Override: Temporarily interface with and influence complex systems like vehicles or automated devices. Resistance: Immune to technological surveillance and electronic interference.

descriptor_specialized_mental.name: Mental
descriptor_specialized_mental.description: Memory Sharing: Share vivid memories, ideas, or concepts directly into another's mind, bypassing verbal communication entirely. Emotion Amplification: Amplify the emotions of those around you to overwhelming levels, inducing fear, joy, or rage. Psychic Defense: Shield yourself from psychic intrusion, emotional manipulation, or mind-altering effects. Memory Recovery: Instantly retrieve forgotten memories or suppressed knowledge, including sensory details from years past. Resistance: Immune to mental manipulation and psychic attacks.

descriptor_specialized_arcane.name: Arcane
descriptor_specialized_arcane.description: Magic Detection: Detect and analyze magical effects within a wide radius, understanding their source and purpose. Glyph Mastery: Decipher, replicate, or counter magical glyphs and sigils, even if highly advanced. Magical Marking: Leave subtle magical traces on objects or locations, readable only by those with arcane knowledge. Artifact Sense: Sense and locate magical artifacts or enchanted items, regardless of concealment. Resistance: Immune to magical effects and supernatural manipulation.

descriptor_reality_time.name: Time
descriptor_reality_time.description: Temporal Perception: Make Awareness checks to see the past/future states of objects and locations. Chronological Analysis: Make Intelligence checks to determine exact timing of past events or predict future schedules. Temporal Crafting: Make Intelligence checks to age or restore objects to different time periods. Historical Investigation: Make Intelligence checks to witness past events as they occurred. Advanced Applications: Accelerate or reverse time in an area, or move yourself through time. Work with GM to establish specific capabilities, limitations, and narrative impact appropriate to your campaign.

descriptor_reality_space.name: Space
descriptor_reality_space.description: Dimensional Analysis: Make Intelligence checks to measure exact distances/volumes without tools or understand spatial relationships. Spatial Navigation: Make Awareness checks to navigate through complex 3D environments or folded space. Geometric Construction: Make Intelligence checks to create perfect geometric forms or impossible architectural spaces. Distance Manipulation: Make Intelligence checks to compress or expand the apparent distance between locations. Advanced Applications: Open rifts to teleport vast distances. Work with GM to establish specific capabilities, limitations, and narrative impact appropriate to your campaign.

descriptor_reality_probability.name: Probability
descriptor_reality_probability.description: Outcome Analysis: Make Intelligence checks to calculate precise odds of complex events or identify statistical anomalies. Pattern Recognition: Make Awareness checks to spot improbable coincidences or detect manipulated probability. Luck Adjustment: Make Intelligence checks to subtly influence random events in your favor. Chaos Detection: Make Awareness checks to sense when probability is being externally manipulated. Advanced Applications: Significantly alter probability outcomes. Work with GM to establish specific limitations and consequences.

descriptor_reality_atomic.name: Atomic
descriptor_reality_atomic.description: Atomic Perception: Perceive the atomic structure of objects, identifying weaknesses or flaws for precise interaction. Density Alteration: Alter the density or composition of objects with a focused effort, such as hardening glass into steel. Atomic Manipulation: Ability to alter the distance between atoms for objects you can touch. Environmental Immunity: Immune to any extreme temperature or radiation effects. Advanced Applications: Ability to start atomic chain reactions. Work with GM to establish specific capabilities, limitations, and narrative impact appropriate to your campaign.

descriptor_reality_cosmic.name: Cosmic
descriptor_reality_cosmic.description: Universal Knowledge: Intuitively know information about the state of the universe, the cosmos, and other cosmic beings. Cosmic Presence: Inspire awe or reverence in those around you, projecting a cosmic aura of authority. Environmental Immunity: Operate unharmed in any environment, immune to any environmental effect. Energy Mastery: Make Intelligence checks to manipulate cosmic forces and stellar energies. Advanced Applications: You can infuse other beings with Cosmic energy and power. Work with GM to establish specific capabilities, limitations, and narrative impact appropriate to your campaign.

effect_type_damage.name: Damage Only
effect_type_damage.description: Focuses on dealing the maximum amount of pure damage.

effects.display: Enables maximum damage potential for the attack.

effect_type_condition.name: Condition Only
effect_type_condition.description: Focuses on applying status effects without dealing any damage.

effect_type_hybrid.name: Hybrid (Damage + Condition)
effect_type_hybrid.description: A versatile attack that applies both damage and a condition simultaneously, but with reduced potency for both.

requirements.display: This is free for the Hybrid Specialist archetype.

feature_utility_aquatic.name: Aquatic
feature_utility_aquatic.description: Swim at full speed in any aquatic environment. You are unaffected by water temperature, pressure, or current when swimming.

feature_utility_debt.name: Debt
feature_utility_debt.description: Someone owes you something. Work with the GM to determine the nature of the debt and what benefits you might gain when attempting to collect.

feature_utility_eideticMemory.name: Eidetic Memory
feature_utility_eideticMemory.description: You can recall any information you've previously encountered with perfect accuracy.

feature_utility_linguist.name: Linguist
feature_utility_linguist.description: You know a dozen languages, including more exotic or ancient ones. If you encounter a language you don’t know, you can attempt to decipher its meaning over time using intelligence.

feature_utility_lock.name: Lock
feature_utility_lock.description: You can place a protective barrier around a container or room. Your bonus to resist someone breaking into the container or room is 3 × your Intelligence. You can only have one lock active at a time, but you can disable and activate a new one at any time from anywhere.

feature_utility_multiLimbed.name: Multi-limbed
feature_utility_multiLimbed.description: You have additional limbs. Each purchase of this feature grants you one extra limb.

feature_utility_naturalCommunication.name: Natural Communication
feature_utility_naturalCommunication.description: You can converse with specific animal types and sense the health, needs, and recent history of plants. They respond with their level of intelligence and knowledge.

feature_utility_parkourMastery.name: Parkour Mastery
feature_utility_parkourMastery.description: Navigate urban environments using walls, buildings, and obstacles as movement paths automatically.

feature_utility_personalVehicle.name: Personal Vehicle
feature_utility_personalVehicle.description: You own a vehicle that allows you to travel quickly.

feature_utility_speakWithAnimals.name: Speak with Animals
feature_utility_speakWithAnimals.description: You can telepathically communicate with animals, and they can respond in kind. For 1 less point, you may instead communicate with only one specific type of animal.

feature_utility_theProphesiedOne.name: The Prophesied One
feature_utility_theProphesiedOne.description: A prophecy involves you. Those who believe in it will go to great lengths to assist you. Work with the GM to determine the prophecy's nature and cost.

feature_utility_waterWalking.name: Water Walking
feature_utility_waterWalking.description: Walk on any liquid surface as if it were solid ground automatically.

feature_utility_ancestralKnowledge.name: Ancestral Knowledge
feature_utility_ancestralKnowledge.description: You can communicate with ancestral spirits for guidance.

feature_utility_assistant.name: Assistant
feature_utility_assistant.description: You can call upon your personal assistant to help with mundane activities such as a butler, driver, or secretary. The assistant can handle routine tasks, carry out errands, and serve as a go-between for important social interactions, offering access to otherwise unavailable opportunities.

feature_utility_auraticSway.name: Auratic Sway
feature_utility_auraticSway.description: Emits a subtle aura that affects emotions or moods in the immediate vicinity. You can make an Intimidation or Communication check against everyone nearby to slightly alter their mood or emotions.

feature_utility_distinguishedBackground.name: Distinguished Background
feature_utility_distinguishedBackground.description: Your distinct heritage, noble birth, or foreign origin marks you as notable wherever you go. This grants you respect and curiosity that can open doors to influential individuals, exclusive events, and valuable information. However, it also makes you memorable and may create unwanted attention or suspicion depending on local politics and attitudes.

feature_utility_dreamwalker.name: Dreamwalker
feature_utility_dreamwalker.description: You can enter and interact with dreams.

feature_utility_elasticMovement.name: Elastic Movement
feature_utility_elasticMovement.description: Stretch your limbs to reach distant objects or compress your body to fit through spaces one-quarter your normal size automatically.

feature_utility_fallProof.name: Fall Proof
feature_utility_fallProof.description: Completely negate fall damage from any height automatically.

feature_utility_familiar.name: Familiar
feature_utility_familiar.description: You have a small-sized creature or construct that obeys your commands. You can see through its senses and control its movement. It uses your skills for any checks; if it's a creature, it uses your Awareness instead of Mobility. It cannot take actions other than skill checks. It has 0 in all combat stats, and if it takes damage, it is destroyed and cannot be resummoned until after a full rest. The familiar can scout dangerous areas, retrieve objects, or act as a distraction.

feature_utility_forbiddance.name: Forbiddance
feature_utility_forbiddance.description: Once per rest, over the course of an hour, you may create a ward that protects up to a 100 by 100 space area from observation, teleportation, and communication through the barrier. Choose one category of being (work with GM to define). Chosen creatures take (10 + Focus or Power) damage per turn spent in the area. The ward lasts one day. If you use this feature every day for 100 days in the same spot, the effect becomes permanent.

feature_utility_glyphOfWarding.name: Glyph of Warding
feature_utility_glyphOfWarding.description: It takes one hour to set up the trap, and you may set it to release one of your special attacks. The glyph may not be moved from where it was set up. You can have a number of active traps equal to your Intelligence score. If the trap is triggered, the attack is released. You suffer/are limited by your limits when setting the trap. Hidden traps require an Awareness or Intelligence check against double your Intelligence to detect.

feature_utility_juryRigging.name: Jury Rigging
feature_utility_juryRigging.description: You can repair or modify the function of any item or object without using materials. However, the repair is temporary and will break again at the end of the session or after intense use. The quality and duration of your repair is based on an Intelligence check determined by the GM.

feature_utility_lightSleeper.name: Light Sleeper
feature_utility_lightSleeper.description: You do not require sleep and are passively aware of your surroundings even while resting. Your Awareness checks are not reduced while resting, and you can remain alert during the party's rest periods. You still require the same rest duration to recover HP, Efforts, and ability uses.

feature_utility_masterSculptor.name: Master Sculptor
feature_utility_masterSculptor.description: Choose a specific material (stone, metal, wood, clay, etc.). You can precisely shape, mold, or alter that material at rapid pace, working on up to 8 cubic meters per minute. This allows you to create tools, artistic works, or modify existing structures made of your chosen material without requiring traditional crafting tools.

feature_utility_materialShaping.name: Material Shaping
feature_utility_materialShaping.description: You can temporarily transform mundane materials and objects into different forms. Convert one material into another similar material, or reshape an object into a different object of similar size and density. You cannot create complex mechanical devices or change the fundamental properties of materials (turning wood into metal, etc.).

feature_utility_mysticGuardian.name: Mystic Guardian
feature_utility_mysticGuardian.description: You can create temporary magical guardians or constructs that can complete simple tasks. These guardians can act as watchmen, couriers, or assistants in problem-solving tasks.

feature_utility_objectEncryption.name: Object Encryption
feature_utility_objectEncryption.description: You can seal items in a protective field to prevent tampering.

feature_utility_prodigy.name: Prodigy
feature_utility_prodigy.description: After 4 hour of focused study, gain Tier bonus to checks involving that specific topic until next rest.

feature_utility_prophet.name: Prophet
feature_utility_prophet.description: You receive visions of a future that may or may not happen. Once per session, you may attempt to force one of these visions. Roll a d100; the higher the number, the more accurate and less vague the vision becomes.

feature_utility_psychicLink.name: Psychic Link
feature_utility_psychicLink.description: You can share or transfer memories with a touch, or form a temporary psychic connection with another being. This can be used for strategic coordination, emotional support, or unique insight.

feature_utility_psychometry.name: Psychometry
feature_utility_psychometry.description: You can perceive the recent history and emotional imprints of objects through touch.

feature_utility_safeHouse.name: Safe House
feature_utility_safeHouse.description: You have access to a home that supports more than just yourself.

feature_utility_socialNetwork.name: Social Network
feature_utility_socialNetwork.description: You have extensive connections with various influential individuals. These connections can provide critical assistance, such as opening doors to exclusive events, securing resources, or obtaining valuable information.

feature_utility_spiritCommunication.name: Spirit Communication
feature_utility_spiritCommunication.description: You can speak with the spirits of the recently deceased in the immediate area.

feature_utility_spiritualBind.name: Spiritual Bind
feature_utility_spiritualBind.description: You can temporarily bind yourself to an object or location, granting limited influence, observation, or protection.

feature_utility_sponsor.name: Sponsor
feature_utility_sponsor.description: Someone has invested a great deal of time and/or money to get you where you are. You have greater access to resources, and they are inclined to protect their investment. However, you are beholden to them, and they might cut their losses if things get too dicey.

feature_utility_stealthGuidance.name: Stealth Guidance
feature_utility_stealthGuidance.description: You can add your Awareness score to the Stealth checks of any allies within 3 spaces of you that you designate. This ability helps your team move undetected while you coordinate their movements and watch for threats.

feature_utility_streetPerformer.name: Street Performer
feature_utility_streetPerformer.description: You can always find opportunities to earn money and resources through performances, hustling, or social connections. Make a Communication check to acquire money or secure free lodging and meals. The GM determines the difficulty based on the amount needed and local circumstances. Success may involve entertaining crowds, making deals, or leveraging social networks.

feature_utility_streetwiseNetwork.name: Streetwise Network
feature_utility_streetwiseNetwork.description: You have connections throughout various segments of society, providing you with valuable information about local people and places wherever you travel.

feature_utility_superStrength.name: Super Strength
feature_utility_superStrength.description: Add your Tier to your Capacity score.

feature_utility_technopathy.name: Technopathy
feature_utility_technopathy.description: You can interface directly with electronic devices and understand their functions/data.

feature_utility_temporalEcho.name: Temporal Echo
feature_utility_temporalEcho.description: You can temporarily replay past events regarding persons, places, and objects. This ability allows you to uncover secrets, retrace steps, or resolve mysteries tied to your surroundings.

feature_utility_underworldConnection.name: Underworld Connection
feature_utility_underworldConnection.description: You maintain a reliable contact within the criminal underworld who can facilitate communication and deliver messages discreetly across long distances. Your connection can also provide contraband, information, or covert assistance.

feature_utility_wellConnected.name: Well Connected
feature_utility_wellConnected.description: Once per session, if you say, "I Know a Guy," workshop with the GM to create an NPC who can help you with a specific task. GM secretly determines your relationship strength. Based on your history and request difficulty, they'll decide what favor or payment is required.

feature_utility_alchemist.name: Alchemist
feature_utility_alchemist.description: You are a master of creating experimental tinctures and tonics. The concoctions work a single time to accomplish a specific goal. You will need time to gather the required ingredients, requiring an Intelligence or Awareness check to forage or rolling a d100 and Communication to purchase. The GM will decide the DCs, the amount of time it takes, and any costs.

feature_utility_astralProjection.name: Astral Projection
feature_utility_astralProjection.description: While resting, you can travel to other locations using a spectral form. You are visible but intangible while astral projecting, able to move through solid objects and observe your surroundings. You can return to your body at will from any distance. You can use this form to gather information or travel to otherwise unreachable places.

feature_utility_bard.name: Bard
feature_utility_bard.description: You can sing a tune to help inspire others. For the next hour, a number of present characters up to your Communication score can add your Tier to a skill check declared before they roll.

feature_utility_consciousnessTransfer.name: Consciousness Transfer
feature_utility_consciousnessTransfer.description: You can temporarily swap consciousness with willing participants.

feature_utility_corruption.name: Corruption
feature_utility_corruption.description: Work with GM to establish corruption mechanics. When taking this feature, choose a trigger condition that grants significant power bonuses but risks permanent character corruption through failed resistance rolls.

feature_utility_enhancedProcessing.name: Enhanced Processing
feature_utility_enhancedProcessing.description: Think and perceive at extremely accelerated speeds while performing hundreds of simple mental tasks simultaneously. This allows you to process information, analyze situations, and react with superhuman mental velocity while tracking multiple variables in complex problems.

feature_utility_hexer.name: Hexer
feature_utility_hexer.description: You are able to inflict complex, lasting, and nearly incurable curses on others. To cast the curse, the target must be aware they are being cursed and within 18 spaces of you for one minute. Additionally, you must know the target's true name and/or one special condition determined by you and the GM. Work with GM to determine appropriate curse effects and lifting conditions.

feature_utility_hiddenTrap.name: Hidden Trap
feature_utility_hiddenTrap.description: It takes one hour to set up the trap, and you may set it to release one of your special attacks. You can set a number of traps equal to your Awareness per rest. If the trap is triggered, the attack is released. You suffer/are limited by your limits when setting the trap. Hidden traps require an Awareness check against double your Awareness to detect and a Mobility check to disarm or avoid.

feature_utility_immortality.name: Immortality
feature_utility_immortality.description: You are immortal, you can be killed but you will return to life after 24 hours. Work with the GM to establish a limitation for said immortality, a way in which you can truly be killed. Additionally, determine where you return and if there are any changes that affect you.

feature_utility_inventor.name: Inventor
feature_utility_inventor.description: You can create technological inventions. These inventions work a single time and to accomplish a specific goal. The GM will determine the Intelligence check difficulty based on the setting. It will take a number of hours of active downtime equal to the difficulty minus 10. Requires a suitable lab or workshop.

feature_utility_knowItAll.name: Know It All
feature_utility_knowItAll.description: You're very bossy and like to tell others how to do things. If you can spend one minute explaining how to do something better, another character can add your Intelligence to any check, provided they follow your advice.

feature_utility_longRangeTeleportation.name: Long-Range Teleportation
feature_utility_longRangeTeleportation.description: Teleport to any location that you can clearly visualize or have previously visited automatically after spending at least 1 minute in preparation, the longer the distance the greater the amount of time it takes.

feature_utility_memoryManipulation.name: Memory Manipulation
feature_utility_memoryManipulation.description: You can view, modify, or implant memories in willing or unconscious subjects. Cannot be used on actively resisting targets.

feature_utility_mindReading.name: Mind Reading
feature_utility_mindReading.description: Make an Intelligence or Awareness check to attempt to read a target's mind that you can see. The GM determines the difficulty based on the target's mental defenses and what information you're seeking. Success reveals the desired thoughts, memories, or knowledge the target possesses.

feature_utility_molecularManipulation.name: Molecular Manipulation
feature_utility_molecularManipulation.description: You can convert one mundane material into another mundane material of similar density and hardness. Wood can become plastic, stone can become metal, or cloth can become leather.

feature_utility_perceptionFilter.name: Perception Filter
feature_utility_perceptionFilter.description: Temporarily render objects or areas unnoticed by others. May require Stealth checks.

feature_utility_quantumPocket.name: Quantum Pocket
feature_utility_quantumPocket.description: You can store and retrieve objects in a subspace storage. This ability allows you to carry large or dangerous items without arousing suspicion or taking up inventory space.

feature_utility_ritualist.name: Ritualist
feature_utility_ritualist.description: You can create magical rituals. These rituals work a single time and to accomplish a specific goal. The GM will determine the check difficulty based on the setting. It will take one uninterrupted hour to complete and may require special ingredients, such as a specific location, blood, or a rare object.

feature_utility_selfSacrifice.name: Self-Sacrifice
feature_utility_selfSacrifice.description: As you activate this feature, increase your Tier by 4, for 6 rounds. At the end of the 6 rounds, you die. May change the penalty and/or bonus for something equivalent, discuss with GM. Cannot use if you have abilities that prevent death.

feature_utility_telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
feature_utility_telekinesis.description: You can move and manipulate objects at a distance using mental force. You can affect objects within your line of sight. The weight limit is based on your Capacity score: light objects effortlessly, medium objects with concentration, and heavy objects requiring significant effort.

feature_utility_telepath.name: Telepath
feature_utility_telepath.description:
You can communicate telepathically with any sentient being you can see or are familiar with across unlimited distances. They can communicate back if willing. You can maintain simultaneous mental links with a number of beings equal to your Intelligence score. Additionally, you can:
- Share complex memories, emotions, or sensory experiences
- Establish permanent mental bonds that persist even when unconscious
- Create group mental networks allowing all linked minds to communicate
- Attempt to influence thoughts and emotions of willing or weakened minds

feature_utility_bleedingEdge.name: Bleeding Edge
feature_utility_bleedingEdge.description: Your technology is the most advanced and powerful there is, allowing you greater feats beyond what normal technology can accomplish. However, it can only be repaired, maintained, modified, or upgraded using very specific or hard-to-find tools, methods, or materials.

feature_utility_chameleon.name: Chameleon
feature_utility_chameleon.description: You can effortlessly alter details about yourself, like hair color, hair length, skin tone, or eye color. You can't change things like bone structure, body shape, height, weight, or other drastic features. This ability can help you blend into a crowd or adopt a new persona during social encounters.

feature_utility_consciousnessProjection.name: Consciousness Projection
feature_utility_consciousnessProjection.description: You can project your consciousness to other locations simultaneously, experiencing multiple places at once. Work with GM to establish specific limitations and duration.

feature_utility_hiveMind.name: Hive Mind
feature_utility_hiveMind.description: You can link multiple minds into a temporary collective consciousness, sharing all thoughts and knowledge.

feature_utility_perfectSanctuary.name: Perfect Sanctuary
feature_utility_perfectSanctuary.description: Create an impenetrable zone around you and your allies for a short duration. Nothing can enter or leave this zone without your permission. Work with GM to establish specific limitations and duration.

feature_utility_realityRevision.name: Reality Revision
feature_utility_realityRevision.description: You can make minor alterations to recent events (within the last hour), changing their outcomes. Work with GM to establish limitations and consequences.

feature_utility_timeTravel.name: Time Travel
feature_utility_timeTravel.description: Move forward or backward through time automatically after spending 1 hour in preparation. Work with GM to determine limitations and potential paradox consequences.

flaw_balanced.name: Balanced
flaw_balanced.description: Must have at least half your Tier rounded down in each Combat Attribute, and can only add your Tier bonus once to each stat across Flaws, Traits, and Primary Actions.

requirements.display: Must maintain minimum combat attribute requirements.

flaw_slow.name: Slow
flaw_slow.description: You cannot select a Movement Archetype.

flaw_combatFocused.name: Combat Focused
flaw_combatFocused.description: You cannot purchase any Utility abilities.

flaw_sickly.name: Sickly
flaw_sickly.description: Your maximum Health Pool is reduced by 30.

flaw_unresponsive.name: Unresponsive
flaw_unresponsive.description: You cannot take Reactions, you do not add your Tier to Initiative, and you cannot benefit from Surprise rounds.

flaw_weak.name: Weak
flaw_weak.description: You get 1 fewer Combat Attribute Point per Tier.

flaw_powerLoss.name: Power Loss
flaw_powerLoss.description: You lose your powers under specific circumstances, determined in discussion with the GM.

flaw_singleTargetSpecialist.name: Single Target Specialist
flaw_singleTargetSpecialist.description: You can only choose Melee OR Ranged attacks, not both.

flaw_equipmentDependent.name: Equipment Dependent
flaw_equipmentDependent.description: Choose a specific item; you lose access to one Archetype benefit without it. The item is noticeable and you can be disarmed of it.

limit_main_charge_up.name: Charge-Up
limit_main_charge_up.description: Must use Primary Action on consecutive turns to charge before using attack.

limit_variant_charge_up_extended_charge.name: Extended Charge
limit_variant_charge_up_extended_charge.description: Must charge for two turns before using.

limit_modifier_extended_charge_triple_ch.name: Triple Charge
limit_modifier_extended_charge_triple_ch.description: Must charge three turns before using.

limit_modifier_extended_charge_cascade_f.name: Cascade Failure
limit_modifier_extended_charge_cascade_f.description: If interrupted during any charge turn, lose ability for rest of combat.

limit_modifier_extended_charge_escalatin.name: Escalating Exposure
limit_modifier_extended_charge_escalatin.description: Each charge turn reduces your Durability by 5.

limit_variant_charge_up_rooted_while_cha.name: Rooted While Charging
limit_variant_charge_up_rooted_while_cha.description: Cannot move between charge-up and release.

limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_imm.name: Immobilized
limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_imm.description: Cannot move until end of turn after releasing attack.

limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_anc.name: Anchored
limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_anc.description: If moved from position by any effect, lose charge.

limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_mel.name: Melee
limit_modifier_rooted_while_charging_mel.description: The attack you are making is a melee attack.

limit_variant_charge_up_concentration.name: Concentration
limit_variant_charge_up_concentration.description: Lose charge if you take damage or gain conditions.

limit_modifier_concentration_fragile_con.name: Fragile Concentration
limit_modifier_concentration_fragile_con.description: Concentration breaks if any character moves adjacent to you.

limit_modifier_concentration_cascade_fai.name: Cascade Failure
limit_modifier_concentration_cascade_fai.description: If concentration broken, you cannot attempt any attack with Concentration for rest of combat.

limit_modifier_concentration_proximity_s.name: Proximity Sensitivity
limit_modifier_concentration_proximity_s.description: Concentration breaks if any character moves within 5 spaces of you.

limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_fr.name: Fragile
limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_fr.description: Avoidance becomes 0 while charging, all attacks are critical hits.

limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_be.name: Beacon
limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_be.description: All enemies within 30 spaces know your exact location while charging.

limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_vu.name: Vulnerable
limit_modifier_exposed_while_charging_vu.description: Take double damage from all sources while charging.

limit_variant_charge_up_power_lock.name: Power Lock
limit_variant_charge_up_power_lock.description: Disable specific defensive ability while charging, gain points equal to that ability's cost.

limit_modifier_power_lock_extended_lock.name: Extended Lock
limit_modifier_power_lock_extended_lock.description: Disabled ability remains unusable until end of next turn.

limit_modifier_power_lock_multiple_lock.name: Multiple Lock
limit_modifier_power_lock_multiple_lock.description: Disable second defensive ability, gain its cost in points.

limit_modifier_power_lock_system_failure.name: System Failure
limit_modifier_power_lock_system_failure.description: Requires Concentration - If interrupted, all locked abilities unusable for rest of combat.

limit_variant_charge_up_focused_charging.name: Focused Charging
limit_variant_charge_up_focused_charging.description: Must also spend Quick Action on charge and release turns.

limit_modifier_focused_charging_total_fo.name: Total Focus
limit_modifier_focused_charging_total_fo.description: Must spend Primary Action, Quick Action, and Movement on charge turns.

limit_modifier_focused_charging_ally_coo.name: Ally Coordination
limit_modifier_focused_charging_ally_coo.description: Adjacent ally must attack same target you're charging against or charge fails.

limit_modifier_focused_charging_reaction.name: Reaction Delay
limit_modifier_focused_charging_reaction.description: Cannot use Reactions while charging, gain points equal to cost of reaction abilities you have purchased.

limit_main_reserves.name: Reserves
limit_main_reserves.description: Can only be used 3 times per combat. Regain all uses after combat ends.

limit_modifier_reserves_2_extended_recov.name: Extended Recovery
limit_modifier_reserves_2_extended_recov.description: Regain uses after full rest instead of after combat, once per day.

limit_variant_reserves_volatile_uses.name: Volatile Uses
limit_variant_reserves_volatile_uses.description: Each time you take damage, lose 1 use.

limit_modifier_volatile_uses_condition_t.name: Condition Trigger
limit_modifier_volatile_uses_condition_t.description: Each time you gain a condition, lose 1 use.

limit_modifier_volatile_uses_critical_fa.name: Critical Failure
limit_modifier_volatile_uses_critical_fa.description: If you roll a natural 1 on any d20, lose 1 use.

limit_modifier_volatile_uses_life_drain.name: Life Drain
limit_modifier_volatile_uses_life_drain.description: If out of uses, and you would lose 1, take 15 damage instead.

limit_variant_reserves_shared_pool.name: Shared Pool
limit_variant_reserves_shared_pool.description: Multiple special attacks share same use pool, total uses divided among them, +1 use to the pool for each special attack added.

limit_modifier_shared_pool_pool_drain.name: Pool Drain
limit_modifier_shared_pool_pool_drain.description: If any attack in pool misses, remove an extra use.

limit_modifier_shared_pool_cascade_lock.name: Cascade Lock
limit_modifier_shared_pool_cascade_lock.description: If any attack in pool misses, no attacks in pool can be used for 1 turn.

limit_variant_reserves_steady.name: Steady
limit_variant_reserves_steady.description: Cannot use until turn 3 of combat.

limit_modifier_steady_patient.name: Patient
limit_modifier_steady_patient.description: Cannot use until turn 5 of combat.

limit_modifier_steady_unhealthy.name: Unhealthy
limit_modifier_steady_unhealthy.description: Must be below half HP to use.

limit_modifier_steady_timid.name: Timid
limit_modifier_steady_timid.description: Cannot use unless you are at full hit points and are not affected by any conditions.

limit_main_cooldown.name: Cooldown
limit_main_cooldown.description: Cannot use again for 1 turn after use.

limit_variant_cooldown_cooldown_2.name: Cooldown 2
limit_variant_cooldown_cooldown_2.description: Cannot use again for 2 turns after use.

limit_modifier_cooldown_2_cooldown_3.name: Cooldown 3
limit_modifier_cooldown_2_cooldown_3.description: Cannot use again for 3 turns after use.

limit_modifier_cooldown_2_permanent_inju.name: Permanent Injury
limit_modifier_cooldown_2_permanent_inju.description: Each use of this limit, permanantly increases all cooldown cooldown periods by 1 turn, until you take a full rest.

limit_modifier_cooldown_2_fates.name: Fates
limit_modifier_cooldown_2_fates.description: Roll a d4-1 when the attack is made, the cooldown is extended by the result.

limit_variant_cooldown_failure_extension.name: Failure Extension
limit_variant_cooldown_failure_extension.description: If attack misses or fails effect, cooldown period increases by 1 turn.

limit_modifier_failure_extension_doublin.name: Doubling Failure
limit_modifier_failure_extension_doublin.description: If attack misses or fails effect, cooldown period increases by 1 turn.

limit_variant_cooldown_shared_cooldown.name: Shared Cooldown
limit_variant_cooldown_shared_cooldown.description: Choose 2 other of your special attacks, they can't be used while you are cooling down from this attack.

limit_modifier_shared_cooldown_increased.name: Increased Cooldown
limit_modifier_shared_cooldown_increased.description: Choose 1 of your more special attacks, they can't be used while you are cooling down from this attack.

limit_modifier_shared_cooldown_mass_cool.name: Mass Cooldown
limit_modifier_shared_cooldown_mass_cool.description: All of your special attacks cannot be used while you are cooling down from this attack.

limit_variant_cooldown_death_proximity.name: Death Proximity
limit_variant_cooldown_death_proximity.description: Cooldown increases by 1 turn for every 25 HP below maximum.

limit_modifier_death_proximity_trigger_e.name: Trigger Extension
limit_modifier_death_proximity_trigger_e.description: Taking damage or gaining conditions adds 1 turn to current cooldown.

limit_modifier_death_proximity_condition.name: Condition Spiral
limit_modifier_death_proximity_condition.description: Conditions aquired last until the end of your cooldown period.

limit_variant_cooldown_healthy.name: Healthy
limit_variant_cooldown_healthy.description: Your cooldowns don't go down unless you are above 50 HP and not affected by any advanced conditions.

limit_modifier_healthy_pinnacle_of_healt.name: Pinnacle of Health
limit_modifier_healthy_pinnacle_of_healt.description: Your cooldowns don't go down unless you are at max HP and not affected by any conditions.

limit_modifier_healthy_timid.name: Timid
limit_modifier_healthy_timid.description: You cannot use this attack unless you are at max HP and not affected by any conditions.

limit_main_unreliable.name: Unreliable
limit_main_unreliable.description: Roll d20 before use; if under 5, attack fails and action is wasted.

limit_modifier_unreliable_10_double_chec.name: Double Check
limit_modifier_unreliable_10_double_chec.description: Must make reliability check twice, both must succeed.

limit_variant_unreliable_stress_breakdow.name: Stress Breakdown
limit_variant_unreliable_stress_breakdow.description: Reliability DC increases by 1 each turn of combat.

limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_rapid_de.name: Rapid Degradation
limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_rapid_de.description: Reliability DC increases by an additional 1 each turn of combat.

limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_health_d.name: Health Dependent
limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_health_d.description: DC increases by 1 for every 10 HP missing.

limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_fearful.name: Fearful
limit_modifier_stress_breakdown_fearful.description: DC increases by 5 if an enemy is adjacent to you.

limit_variant_unreliable_equipment_depen.name: Equipment Dependent
limit_variant_unreliable_equipment_depen.description: You have a specific, noticeable and disarmable item, in order to do any attack. There needs to be a reason, you wouldn't always have this item on you. (discuss with GM)

limit_modifier_equipment_dependent_fragi.name: Fragile Gear
limit_modifier_equipment_dependent_fragi.description: If you fail the Unreliable roll, the item breaks and won't be fixed until you spend 8 hours, or meet another specified condition (discuss with GM).

limit_modifier_equipment_dependent_maint.name: Maintenance
limit_modifier_equipment_dependent_maint.description: Equipment breaks if attack fails, requires action to repair.

limit_variant_unreliable_cascading_failu.name: Cascading Failure
limit_variant_unreliable_cascading_failu.description: Each failure increases next reliability DC by 5.

limit_modifier_cascading_failure_spread_.name: Spread Effect
limit_modifier_cascading_failure_spread_.description: Failed checks increase DC for all your special attacks.

limit_modifier_cascading_failure_critica.name: Critical Cascade
limit_modifier_cascading_failure_critica.description: Failures in combat make ability unusable for rest of session.

limit_variant_unreliable_attrition.name: Attrition
limit_variant_unreliable_attrition.description: When unreliable roll fails, take 15 damage.

limit_modifier_attrition_attrition_2.name: Attrition 2
limit_modifier_attrition_attrition_2.description: When unreliable roll fails, take an additional 15 damage.

limit_modifier_attrition_concussive_kick.name: Concussive Kickback
limit_modifier_attrition_concussive_kick.description: When unreliable roll fails, gain Stun condition, until the start of your next turn.

limit_modifier_attrition_exhaustive.name: Exhaustive
limit_modifier_attrition_exhaustive.description: When unreliable roll fails, you must spend an effort or fall unconscious.

limit_main_combo_move.name: Combo Move
limit_main_combo_move.description: You must have hit an enemy on your last turn.

limit_variant_combo_move_revenge.name: Revenge
limit_variant_combo_move_revenge.description: You must have done damage or inflicted a condition on your last turn.

limit_modifier_revenge_kill_history.name: Kill History
limit_modifier_revenge_kill_history.description: You must have defeated an enemy on your last turn.

limit_modifier_revenge_perfect_opening.name: Perfect Opening
limit_modifier_revenge_perfect_opening.description: You must have critically hit on your last turn.

limit_modifier_revenge_follow_up.name: Follow-Up
limit_modifier_revenge_follow_up.description: You must hit the same enemy as you did last turn.

limit_variant_combo_move_switch_hitter.name: Switch Hitter
limit_variant_combo_move_switch_hitter.description: Can only target enemies you have not damaged this combat.

limit_modifier_switch_hitter_first_blood.name: First Blood
limit_modifier_switch_hitter_first_blood.description: Can only target enemies no ally has damaged this combat.

limit_modifier_switch_hitter_finishing_m.name: Finishing Move
limit_modifier_switch_hitter_finishing_m.description: Can only target enemies below half max HP.

limit_modifier_ally_setup_coordination.name: Coordination
