limit_modifier_ally_setup_perfect_teamwo.name: Perfect Teamwork
limit_modifier_ally_setup_perfect_teamwo.description: Must be a specific Ally, chosen when limit taken.

limit_variant_combo_move_steady.name: Steady
limit_variant_combo_move_steady.description: Cannot use until turn 3 of combat.

limit_modifier_steady_patient_combo.name: Patient
limit_modifier_steady_patient_combo.description: Cannot use until turn 5 of combat.

limit_variant_combo_move_escalation.name: Escalation
limit_variant_combo_move_escalation.description: Cannot use until an ally is below half HP.

limit_modifier_escalation_desperation.name: Desperation
limit_modifier_escalation_desperation.description: Cannot use until ally is unconscious.

limit_variant_combo_move_set_up.name: Set Up
limit_variant_combo_move_set_up.description: Must have hit with a specific special attack (chosen when limit taken).

limit_modifier_set_up_solid_set_up.name: Solid Set Up
limit_modifier_set_up_solid_set_up.description: Must have damaged or inflicted a condition with a specific special attack (chosen when limit taken).

limit_modifier_set_up_perfect_opening_co.name: Perfect Opening
limit_modifier_set_up_perfect_opening_co.description: Must have critically hit with specific special attack.

limit_main_unhealthy.name: Unhealthy
limit_main_unhealthy.description: Can only use when below max HP.

limit_variant_unhealthy_unhealthy_2.name: Unhealthy 2
limit_variant_unhealthy_unhealthy_2.description: Can only use when at 75 HP or below.

limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_3.name: Unhealthy 3
limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_3.description: Can only use when at 50 HP or below.

limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_4.name: Unhealthy 4
limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_4.description: Can only use when at 25 HP or below.

limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_5.name: Unhealthy 5
limit_modifier_unhealthy_2_unhealthy_5.description: Can only use when at 0 HP or below.

limit_variant_unhealthy_fresh_wound_1.name: Fresh Wound 1
limit_variant_unhealthy_fresh_wound_1.description: Must have taken 15+ damage since the end of your last turn to use.

limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_fresh_wound.name: Fresh Wound 2
limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_fresh_wound.description: Must have taken 30+ damage since the end of your last turn to use.

limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_continuous_.name: Continuous Suffering
limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_continuous_.description: Must have taken damage on every turn for the last 3 turns, cannot be caused by Attrition.

limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_condition_l.name: Condition Lock
limit_modifier_fresh_wound_1_condition_l.description: Must be afflicted by a condition.

limit_variant_unhealthy_attrition_1.name: Attrition 1
limit_variant_unhealthy_attrition_1.description: Each use costs 15 HP, paid after attack resolves.

limit_modifier_attrition_1_attrition_x.name: Attrition X
limit_modifier_attrition_1_attrition_x.description: Each successive use costs additional 15 HP (15, 30, 45, etc.)

limit_modifier_attrition_1_concussed.name: Concussed
limit_modifier_attrition_1_concussed.description: You become stunned until the end of your next turn.

limit_variant_unhealthy_desperation.name: Desperation
limit_variant_unhealthy_desperation.description: Can only use when an ally is at 25 HP or below.

limit_modifier_desperation_last_resort.name: Last Resort
limit_modifier_desperation_last_resort.description: Can only use when 2+ allies are at 25 HP or below.

limit_modifier_desperation_avenger.name: Avenger
limit_modifier_desperation_avenger.description: Can when an ally is unconscious.

movement_feature_utility_wallWalking.name: Wall Walking
movement_feature_utility_wallWalking.description: Move on walls and ceilings at normal speed, defying gravity on solid surfaces. You can change orientation as part of your movement without spending additional actions.

movement_feature_utility_burrowing.name: Burrowing
movement_feature_utility_burrowing.description: Move through earth, sand, or loose rock at half speed. You create temporary tunnels that collapse after you pass unless you spend a Primary Action to make them permanent.

movement_feature_utility_flight.name: Flight
movement_feature_utility_flight.description: Move in any direction at full speed with perfect maneuverability. You can hover in place and are unaffected by ground-based obstacles or terrain penalties.

movement_feature_utility_phasing.name: Phasing
movement_feature_utility_phasing.description: Selectively phase parts of your body or your entire body through solid barriers at normal speed. You must end your movement in an unoccupied space.

movement_feature_utility_shortRangeTelep.name: Short-Range Teleportation
movement_feature_utility_shortRangeTelep.description: Instantly teleport to any visible location within your movement range. This movement ignores obstacles and opportunity attacks. You cannot teleport to occupied spaces or locations you cannot clearly see.

movement_feature_utility_portalCreation.name: Portal Creation
movement_feature_utility_portalCreation.description: Create two linked portals as part of your movement action. Each portal occupies one space and can be placed anywhere within your movement range. Your movement is consumed equal to the total distance between both portal locations. Any creature or object can move through either portal to instantly emerge from the other. Portals persist until the start of your next turn or until you create new ones. Only one pair of portals can exist at a time.

sense_utility_darkvision.name: Darkvision
sense_utility_darkvision.description: Make Awareness checks to see clearly in complete darkness as if it were dim light.

sense_utility_enhancedHearing.name: Enhanced Hearing
sense_utility_enhancedHearing.description: Make Awareness checks to hear sounds at frequencies beyond the normal human range or at much greater distances.

sense_utility_scentEnhancement.name: Scent Enhancement
sense_utility_scentEnhancement.description: Make Awareness checks to identify specific individuals, substances, or emotional states through smell.

sense_utility_tactileSensitivity.name: Tactile Sensitivity
sense_utility_tactileSensitivity.description: Make Awareness checks to detect minute textures, vibrations, or temperature differences through touch.

sense_utility_magneticSense.name: Magnetic Sense
sense_utility_magneticSense.description: Make Awareness checks to determine cardinal directions and detect magnetic fields or metal objects.

sense_utility_scentTracking.name: Scent Tracking
sense_utility_scentTracking.description: Make Awareness checks to follow trails by scent, even hours or days old.

sense_utility_echolocation.name: Echolocation
sense_utility_echolocation.description: Make Awareness checks to navigate and identify objects in complete darkness using sound reflection. Range: Tier × 10 Sp.

sense_utility_thermalVision.name: Thermal Vision
sense_utility_thermalVision.description: Make Awareness checks to see heat signatures through walls and detect living creatures by their body temperature.

sense_utility_microscopicVision.name: Microscopic Vision
sense_utility_microscopicVision.description: Make Awareness checks to see cellular-level detail, identify microscopic organisms, or examine fine craftsmanship.

sense_utility_tremorSense.name: Tremor Sense
sense_utility_tremorSense.description: Make Awareness checks to detect movement and identify creatures through ground vibrations. Range: Tier × 5 Sp.

sense_utility_auraSight.name: Aura Sight
sense_utility_auraSight.description: Make Awareness checks to perceive emotional states, health conditions, and supernatural auras around living beings.

sense_utility_timeSense.name: Time Sense
sense_utility_timeSense.description: Make Awareness checks to perceive temporal distortions, time dilation effects, or chronological inconsistencies.

sense_utility_xrayVision.name: X-Ray Vision
sense_utility_xrayVision.description: Make Awareness checks to see through solid objects up to Tier × 2 Sp thick, revealing hidden structures or concealed items.

sense_utility_psychicResonance.name: Psychic Resonance
sense_utility_psychicResonance.description: Make Awareness checks to detect psychic activity, mental powers in use, or lingering psychic imprints.

sense_utility_dimensionalSight.name: Dimensional Sight
sense_utility_dimensionalSight.description: Make Awareness checks to see into adjacent dimensions, detect dimensional rifts, or spot interdimensional travelers.

sense_utility_lifeDetection.name: Life Detection
sense_utility_lifeDetection.description: Make Awareness checks to sense all living creatures within Tier × 100 Sp, regardless of concealment or barriers.

sense_utility_energySight.name: Energy Sight
sense_utility_energySight.description: Make Awareness checks to see all forms of energy (electrical, magical, radioactive) as visible spectrums.

sense_utility_precognition.name: Precognition
sense_utility_precognition.description: Make Awareness checks to glimpse potential futures.

sense_utility_scrying.name: Scrying
sense_utility_scrying.description: Make Awareness checks to remotely view any location you can clearly visualize or have previously visited. You can see and hear as if you were present at that location. Range is unlimited but clarity decreases with distance and unfamiliarity.

sense_utility_auraAnalysis.name: Aura Analysis
sense_utility_auraAnalysis.description: Make Awareness checks to perceive detailed information about any living being's powers, health status, emotional state, recent activities, and supernatural nature. This reveals their capabilities, conditions, and recent significant experiences through their personal aura.

sense_utility_truthSight.name: Truth Sight
sense_utility_truthSight.description: Make Awareness checks to see through all forms of deception, illusion, disguise, and concealment. This reveals the true nature of people, objects, and situations, cutting through magical and mundane forms of misdirection.

sense_utility_uniqueSense.name: Unique Sense
sense_utility_uniqueSense.description: Gain a supernatural sense for a specific phenomenon within 10 spaces at Tier 1, doubling each additional Tier. You automatically detect obvious manifestations; subtle ones require opposed Awareness checks. Examples include effects from a Descriptor (Electricity, Space, Time, Magic), a type of being (Human, divine beings, eldritch horror, powered person), or usage of an ability (Teleporting, Burrowing, specific Feature usage).

skill_mobility_climbing.name: Climbing
skill_mobility_climbing.description: Navigating vertical terrain with speed and control

skill_mobility_acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
skill_mobility_acrobatics.description: Tumbling, flipping, and maintaining balance in motion

skill_power_force.name: Force
skill_power_force.description: Breaking, lifting, shoving, and overpowering obstacles

skill_power_leaping.name: Leaping
skill_power_leaping.description: Explosive jumps and extended aerial movement

skill_power_grappling.name: Grappling
skill_power_grappling.description: Holding, pinning, or throwing in close combat

skill_endurance_resistance.name: Resistance
skill_endurance_resistance.description: Withstanding pain, illness, toxins, or conditions

skill_focus_crafting.name: Crafting
skill_focus_crafting.description: Building, repairing, and shaping physical tools or items

skill_awareness_tracking.name: Tracking
skill_awareness_tracking.description: Following trails, signs, or behavioral patterns

skill_awareness_searching.name: Searching
skill_awareness_searching.description: Scanning for hidden, lost, or obscured details

skill_awareness_perception.name: Perception
skill_awareness_perception.description: Noticing changes, cues, or threats in real time

skill_awareness_senseMotives.name: Sense Motives
skill_awareness_senseMotives.description: Reading intent, emotion, or deception in others

skill_communication_persuasion.name: Persuasion
skill_communication_persuasion.description: Convincing others with logic, charm, or appeal

skill_communication_deception.name: Deception
skill_communication_deception.description: Misleading through lies, trickery, or half-truths

skill_communication_intimidation.name: Intimidation
skill_communication_intimidation.description: Coercing through fear, threat, or force of presence

skill_communication_understand.name: Understand
skill_communication_understand.description: Interpreting tone, language, and hidden meaning

skill_intelligence_innovate.name: Innovate
skill_intelligence_innovate.description: Developing new methods, systems, or breakthroughs

skill_intelligence_decoding.name: Decoding
skill_intelligence_decoding.description: Interpreting codes, puzzles, or unfamiliar systems

skill_intelligence_research.name: Research
skill_intelligence_research.description: Investigating topics, gathering data, or studying deeply

skill_intelligence_problemSolving.name: Problem Solving
skill_intelligence_problemSolving.description: Applying logic and creativity to overcome challenges

trait_condition_irregular1.name: Irregular 1
trait_condition_irregular1.description: Roll d20, DC 5 to activate each turn

trait_condition_relentless.name: Relentless
trait_condition_relentless.description: Dealt damage to enemy last turn

trait_condition_overwhelm.name: Overwhelm
trait_condition_overwhelm.description: Dealt damage to enemy this turn

trait_condition_temporary3.name: Temporary 3
trait_condition_temporary3.description: Activate for 3 turns, recharges after 1 minute rest

trait_condition_timid.name: Timid
trait_condition_timid.description: At max HP with no conditions

trait_condition_unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
trait_condition_unbreakable.description: Been hit but took no damage since last turn

trait_condition_unhealthy2.name: Unhealthy 2
trait_condition_unhealthy2.description: HP is 25% or less of maximum (e.g. 75+ points below max HP for a 100HP character)

trait_condition_untouchable.name: Untouchable
trait_condition_untouchable.description: All attacks missed since last turn

trait_condition_temporary2.name: Temporary 2
trait_condition_temporary2.description: Activate for 2 turns, recharges after 1 minute rest

trait_condition_temporary1.name: Temporary 1
trait_condition_temporary1.description: Activate for 1 turn, recharges after 1 minute rest

trait_condition_irregular2.name: Irregular 2
trait_condition_irregular2.description: Roll d20, DC 10 to activate each turn

trait_condition_dangerous.name: Dangerous
trait_condition_dangerous.description: No allies within 15 spaces, no civilians within 30 spaces

trait_condition_avenger.name: Avenger
trait_condition_avenger.description: Ally unconscious or great peril occurred

trait_condition_environment_specific.name: Environment Specific
trait_condition_environment_specific.description: Active in specific locations (e.g., while in electricity, water, urban area, forest). GM determines tier point cost (1-3).

trait_condition_time_specific.name: Time Specific
trait_condition_time_specific.description: Active at specific times (e.g., night, full moon, day). GM determines tier point cost (1-3).

trait_condition_weather_specific.name: Weather Specific
trait_condition_weather_specific.description: Active in specific weather (e.g., stormy, sunny, cloudy). GM determines tier point cost (1-3).

trait_condition_descriptor_synergy.name: Descriptor Synergy
trait_condition_descriptor_synergy.description: Active when interacting with or affected by a specific Descriptor (e.g., after being hit with energy, while standing in an area of magical darkness). GM determines tier point cost (1-3).

trait_custom.name: Custom Trait
trait_custom.description: Define a set of conditions under which you gain powerful bonuses. Costs 30 Main Pool Points. Allows selection of trait conditions totaling 3 'Trait Condition Points' (e.g., three Tier 1 conditions, or one Tier 1 and one Tier 2, or one Tier 3). Upon configuring the conditions, you also choose two different core stats (Accuracy, Damage, Conditions, Avoidance, Durability, All Resistances, or Movement) to receive a +Tier bonus when all selected trait conditions are met.

effects.display: +Tier to 2 chosen stats when all selected trait conditions are met.

configuration_rules.selection_prompt: Select trait conditions that sum up to 3 points (Tier 1 = 1pt, Tier 2 = 2pts, Tier 3 = 3pts).

unique_ability_aura.name: Aura
unique_ability_aura.description: A passive field around you affecting enemies or allies. It requires an Action to activate and a Quick Action each turn to maintain. Choose one type: Attack, Obscuring, or Bolster.

upgrade_aura_rangedorigin.name: Ranged Origin
upgrade_aura_rangedorigin.description: Originates from another point you can see within 15 spaces. If centered on an ally, the point will move with them.

upgrade_aura_variablesize.name: Variable Size
upgrade_aura_variablesize.description: Change the size of the aura with each activation to any unlocked size.

upgrade_aura_additionaleffect.name: Additional Effect
upgrade_aura_additionaleffect.description: A second aura type is active simultaneously.

upgrade_aura_conditioneffect.name: Condition Effect
upgrade_aura_conditioneffect.description: The Attack Aura inflicts a Basic Condition instead of damage.

upgrade_aura_directeffect.name: Direct Effect
upgrade_aura_directeffect.description: The Attack Aura auto-hits without an Accuracy roll, but suffers a -Tier penalty to Damage and Condition rolls.

upgrade_aura_precise.name: Precise
upgrade_aura_precise.description: The Attack Aura only affects chosen targets.

upgrade_aura_squadsight.name: Squad Sight
upgrade_aura_squadsight.description: Your allies can also see through your Obscuring Aura.

upgrade_aura_passivebuff.name: Passive Buff
upgrade_aura_passivebuff.description: You and allies in the Bolster Aura are always under the effect of X specified Fighting Actions. This bonus stacks for allies but not for your own Fighting Actions.

unique_ability_createwall.name: Create Wall
unique_ability_createwall.description: Create a temporary battlefield structure. It requires an Action to summon and a Quick Action each turn to maintain. The wall has Tier uses per rest.

upgrade_createwall_increasedsize.name: Increased Size
upgrade_createwall_increasedsize.description: Increase the number of spaces by an additional Tier × 5 per purchase.

upgrade_createwall_shapeable.name: Shapeable
upgrade_createwall_shapeable.description: Freely manipulate the size and shape of the wall.

upgrade_createwall_bendable.name: Bendable
upgrade_createwall_bendable.description: Add a 90-degree bend to the wall.

upgrade_createwall_permeable.name: Permeable
upgrade_createwall_permeable.description: You and your allies can move through the wall once per turn. Enemies must succeed on a Stability check vs 10 + (Tier × 2) to pass through.

upgrade_createwall_firingposition.name: Firing Position
upgrade_createwall_firingposition.description: Targets on one side of the wall can target characters on the other side. This must be declared when the wall is created.

upgrade_createwall_damaging.name: Damaging
upgrade_createwall_damaging.description: Touching or making a melee attack against the wall triggers a Direct Base Attack against the character.

upgrade_createwall_tough.name: Tough
upgrade_createwall_tough.description: The wall has 100 HP instead of 50 HP.

upgrade_createwall_moveable.name: Moveable
upgrade_createwall_moveable.description: You can move the wall using your movement, where each space moved consumes 1 space of your Movement.

upgrade_createwall_rapidsummon.name: Rapid Summon
upgrade_createwall_rapidsummon.description: Add your Tier to the placement roll per purchase.

upgrade_createwall_permanent.name: Permanent
upgrade_createwall_permanent.description: The wall does not require maintenance and lasts until destroyed.

unique_ability_shield.name: Shield
unique_ability_shield.description: A personal protective shield. You gain a shield with Tier×3 HP at the start of each turn (not cumulative). The shield's HP is depleted before your regular HP. You cannot boost your Avoidance or Durability outside of Fighting Actions or external sources.

upgrade_shield_increasedshielding.name: Increased Shielding
upgrade_shield_increasedshielding.description: +Tier×3 max shield HP per purchase (recovery stays the same).

upgrade_shield_quickrecovery.name: Quick Recovery
upgrade_shield_quickrecovery.description: Recover an additional Tier×3 HP per turn per purchase.

upgrade_shield_heavyshield.name: Heavy Shield
upgrade_shield_heavyshield.description: Only recover Tier HP per turn (this cannot be increased).

upgrade_shield_areashield.name: Area Shield
upgrade_shield_areashield.description: While the shield has HP, all ranged or AOE attacks against adjacent squares hit the shield instead.

upgrade_shield_source.name: Source
upgrade_shield_source.description: You do not naturally regain your shield. Instead, determine a trigger and amount of shield recharged with your GM (e.g., regain shield equal to damage dealt).

unique_ability_backlash.name: Backlash
unique_ability_backlash.description: An automatic counterattack system. When you are hit by a Melee Attack, you can make a Base Attack against the attacker. You have 2 uses per round, which reset at the start of your turn.

upgrade_backlash_distantresponse.name: Distant Response
upgrade_backlash_distantresponse.description: Can be triggered by any attack type, and you can respond with a Ranged or Direct Base Attack.

upgrade_backlash_explosiveresponse.name: Explosive Response
upgrade_backlash_explosiveresponse.description: The counterattack becomes a 3-space AOE Burst instead of a single target attack.

unique_ability_boost.name: Boost
unique_ability_boost.description: A temporary power enhancement. As a Free Action, you can increase your Tier by half (rounded up). Duration options: Short (4 turns, 1/fight) or Source (environment/descriptor trigger).

upgrade_boost_awakened.name: Awakened
upgrade_boost_awakened.description: Pick an additional Movement Archetype when purchasing this ability.

upgrade_boost_unstoppable.name: Unstoppable
upgrade_boost_unstoppable.description: Pick an additional Defensive Archetype when purchasing this ability.

upgrade_boost_affectsothers.name: Affects Others
upgrade_boost_affectsothers.description: You can target other characters instead of yourself.

upgrade_boost_affectsothersonly.name: Affects Others Only
upgrade_boost_affectsothersonly.description: You can only target others, not yourself.

unique_ability_basesummon.name: Base Summon
unique_ability_basesummon.description: Create a basic summon with stats equal to your Tier, 10 HP (minion), no Special Attacks or Utility abilities. It acts on your initiative.

upgrade_basesummon_mobile.name: Mobile
upgrade_basesummon_mobile.description: The summon gets a Movement archetype.

upgrade_basesummon_extrapoints.name: Extra Points
upgrade_basesummon_extrapoints.description: The summon gains X points for its base abilities.

upgrade_basesummon_alternatesummons.name: Alternate Summons
upgrade_basesummon_alternatesummons.description: A resummoned creature can have different stats.

upgrade_basesummon_resummon.name: Resummon
upgrade_basesummon_resummon.description: Can be resummoned X additional times after defeat.

upgrade_basesummon_helpfulcompanion.name: Helpful Companion
upgrade_basesummon_helpfulcompanion.description: The summon gets access to the Utility section.

upgrade_basesummon_source.name: Source
upgrade_basesummon_source.description: Requires specific conditions to summon; the summon adds your Tier to a chosen stat.

upgrade_basesummon_captain.name: Captain
upgrade_basesummon_captain.description: The summon has 25 HP instead of 10 HP.

upgrade_basesummon_elite.name: Elite
upgrade_basesummon_elite.description: The summon has 50 HP instead of 25 HP.

upgrade_basesummon_boss.name: Boss
upgrade_basesummon_boss.description: The summon has 100 HP instead of 50 HP.

upgrade_basesummon_heroic.name: Heroic
upgrade_basesummon_heroic.description: The summon gets a Special Attacks archetype and can have special attacks.

upgrade_basesummon_unique.name: Unique
upgrade_basesummon_unique.description: The summon gets a Unique Abilities archetype.

upgrade_basesummon_masssummoner.name: Mass Summoner
upgrade_basesummon_masssummoner.description: Summon all your summons as a single action, and modifiers apply to all.

upgrade_basesummon_gamehunter.name: Game Hunter
upgrade_basesummon_gamehunter.description: You can summon defeated enemies under specific conditions (requires GM approval).

unique_ability_invisibility.name: Invisibility
unique_ability_invisibility.description: An advanced concealment ability. You become Invisible and can take the Hide Action even while in the line of sight of enemies. You are unaffected by sight-based abilities.

unique_ability_regeneration.name: Regeneration
unique_ability_regeneration.description: A rapid healing ability. You regain HP at the start of each turn based on your Tier (Tiers 1-4: 20 HP, Tiers 5-6: 30 HP, Tiers 7-8: 40 HP, Tiers 9-10: 50 HP). If unconscious, you wake up once healed to full HP. You cannot boost your Avoidance or Durability outside of Fighting Actions or external sources.

unique_ability_heal.name: Heal
unique_ability_heal.description: Restore health to other characters. Touch a living being to heal them for (5 × Tier) HP. You have 5 uses per rest.

upgrade_heal_increasedcharges.name: Increased Charges
upgrade_heal_increasedcharges.description: Double the number of charges per purchase.

upgrade_heal_increasedhealing.name: Increased Healing
upgrade_heal_increasedhealing.description: Double the HP healed per purchase.

upgrade_heal_greaterhealing.name: Greater Healing
upgrade_heal_greaterhealing.description: Use an additional charge on the same target with the same action.

upgrade_heal_restorativeonly.name: Restorative Only
upgrade_heal_restorativeonly.description: This ability removes all Conditions instead of healing damage.

upgrade_heal_restorative.name: Restorative
upgrade_heal_restorative.description: This ability also removes all Conditions.

upgrade_heal_healsobjectsonly.name: Heals Objects Only
upgrade_heal_healsobjectsonly.description: This ability works on objects instead of living beings.

upgrade_heal_healsobjects.name: Heals Objects
upgrade_heal_healsobjects.description: This ability works on both objects and living beings.

upgrade_heal_ranged.name: Ranged
upgrade_heal_ranged.description: You can target a creature up to 15 spaces away.

upgrade_heal_sharedhealing.name: Shared Healing
upgrade_heal_sharedhealing.description: Pick an additional target within range per use, costing an extra charge.

upgrade_heal_masshealing.name: Mass Healing
upgrade_heal_masshealing.description: Heal any number of selected targets within 6 spaces of you, expending a charge for each target.

upgrade_heal_quickhealing.name: Quick Healing
upgrade_heal_quickhealing.description: You can use this ability as a Quick Action.

upgrade_heal_versatilehealer.name: Versatile Healer
upgrade_heal_versatilehealer.description: You can build an additional version of your Heal, including this upgrade, for each purchase.

unique_ability_counter.name: Counter
unique_ability_counter.description: Nullify enemy actions. On your turn, declare a target you can see within 30 spaces. As a Reaction to that target taking an action, you can make a check (Focus or Power + Tier vs their Resistance). On success, their action is nullified. You can use this twice per round, but only the first use consumes your reaction.

upgrade_counter_stunningcounter.name: Stunning Counter
upgrade_counter_stunningcounter.description: A successful Counter also stuns the target until the end of their turn.

upgrade_counter_disablingcounter.name: Disabling Counter
upgrade_counter_disablingcounter.description: The target cannot use the attempted action again until the end of their next turn.

upgrade_counter_extracounter.name: Extra Counter
upgrade_counter_extracounter.description: Gain X extra uses per round.

upgrade_counter_source.name: Source
upgrade_counter_source.description: This can only disable specific power types (discuss with GM).

upgrade_generic_extended_range.name: Extended Range
upgrade_generic_extended_range.description: Ranged attacks reach 30 spaces instead of 15.

upgrade_generic_long_range.name: Long Range
upgrade_generic_long_range.description: Ranged attacks reach 100 spaces instead of 15.

upgrade_generic_perception_range.name: Perception Range
upgrade_generic_perception_range.description: Direct attacks can target anyone you can see instead of 30 spaces.

upgrade_generic_enhanced_scale.name: Enhanced Scale
upgrade_generic_enhanced_scale.description: Double the size of Area attacks (e.g., 6sp radius, 12sp cone, 24sp line).

upgrade_generic_precise.name: Precise
upgrade_generic_precise.description: Choose which targets are affected by Area attacks.

upgrade_generic_ranged_aoe.name: Ranged AOE
upgrade_generic_ranged_aoe.description: Area attacks can originate from a designated point within 15 spaces.

upgrade_accuracy_accurateattack.name: Accurate Attack
upgrade_accuracy_accurateattack.description: +Tier to Accuracy rolls, -Tier to Damage and Condition rolls. A basic accuracy/damage trade-off.

upgrade_accuracy_reliableaccuracy.name: Reliable Accuracy
upgrade_accuracy_reliableaccuracy.description: Advantage on Accuracy rolls, but suffer a -4 penalty to all Accuracy rolls. For consistent hitting with a reduced total bonus.

upgrade_accuracy_criticalaccuracy.name: Critical Accuracy
upgrade_accuracy_criticalaccuracy.description: Your critical hit range is expanded to 15-20 on the d20.

upgrade_accuracy_powerfulcritical.name: Powerful Critical
upgrade_accuracy_powerfulcritical.description: Add your Tier bonus again to Damage and Condition rolls on critical hits. Enhances the strength of your critical hit effects.

upgrade_accuracy_overhit.name: Overhit
upgrade_accuracy_overhit.description: When your Accuracy roll exceeds the target's Avoidance by 5 or more, add half the difference to your Effect roll. Rewards high accuracy against low-defense targets.

upgrade_accuracy_blitz.name: Blitz
upgrade_accuracy_blitz.description: +1 Accuracy for every 6 spaces you moved toward the target this turn. A mobile attacker bonus that stacks with movement.

upgrade_accuracy_ricochet.name: Ricochet
upgrade_accuracy_ricochet.description: Critical hits trigger an additional attack against a different target within range.

upgrade_accuracy_doubletap.name: Double-Tap
upgrade_accuracy_doubletap.description: Critical hits trigger the same attack again against the same target.

upgrade_accuracy_explosivecritical.name: Explosive Critical
upgrade_accuracy_explosivecritical.description: Critical hits trigger an attack against all enemies within 3 spaces of the target, if the attack would also hit them.

upgrade_damage_powerattack.name: Power Attack
upgrade_damage_powerattack.description: +Tier to Damage rolls, -Tier to Accuracy rolls. A basic damage/accuracy trade-off.

upgrade_damage_highimpact.name: High Impact
upgrade_damage_highimpact.description: Replace your 3d6 damage roll with a flat 15 damage. Eliminates damage variance for consistent output.

upgrade_damage_enhancedeffect.name: Enhanced Effect
upgrade_damage_enhancedeffect.description: Add one additional damage die to your damage rolls. This increases your damage potential and average.

upgrade_damage_reliableeffect.name: Reliable Effect
upgrade_damage_reliableeffect.description: Roll an extra damage die, then drop the lowest result.

upgrade_damage_criticaleffect.name: Critical Effect
upgrade_damage_criticaleffect.description: All effect dice explode on rolls of 5 or 6. Dice continue rolling when showing 5-6, and results are cumulative.

upgrade_damage_armorpiercing.name: Armor Piercing
upgrade_damage_armorpiercing.description: Suffer a -Tier penalty to your Attack rolls to ignore the target's Durability bonus from their Endurance attribute. For Direct attacks, reduce the Damage roll instead of the Attack roll.

upgrade_damage_brutal.name: Brutal
upgrade_damage_brutal.description: When your Damage roll exceeds the target's Durability by 10 or more, you deal extra damage equal to half the difference.

upgrade_damage_bleed.name: Bleed
upgrade_damage_bleed.description: The target takes the identical damage again at the end of your next 2 turns.

upgrade_damage_splashdamage.name: Splash Damage
upgrade_damage_splashdamage.description: Adjacent targets take Tier+1d6 damage if your Attack roll would hit their Avoidance. Applies to Melee and Ranged attacks only.

upgrade_damage_environmental.name: Environmental
upgrade_damage_environmental.description: All hexes hit by the attack become hazardous terrain until the start of your next turn. Each rank after the first is an extra turn. Any character entering or ending their turn in an affected space takes the attack's Damage and Condition. Cannot have 'Precise' upgrade.

upgrade_damage_shatter.name: Shatter
upgrade_damage_shatter.description: Deal double damage to structures and vehicles. A specialized anti-object enhancement.

upgrade_damage_leech.name: Leech
upgrade_damage_leech.description: Regain HP equal to half the damage you deal.

upgrade_damage_finishingblow.name: Finishing Blow
upgrade_damage_finishingblow.description: If your attack reduces an enemy to 5×rank HP or below, the enemy is defeated instead. Maximum 3 ranks.

upgrade_damage_cullingstrike.name: Culling Strike
upgrade_damage_cullingstrike.description: If your attack reduces an enemy below 1/5 of their maximum HP, the enemy is defeated instead.

upgrade_condition_criticalcondition.name: Critical Condition
upgrade_condition_criticalcondition.description: Your Condition rolls critically hit on a 15-20 range on the d20.

upgrade_condition_lastingcondition.name: Lasting Condition
upgrade_condition_lastingcondition.description: If your Condition roll exceeds the target's Resistance by 10 or more, the condition's duration extends by 1 turn.

upgrade_condition_masseffect.name: Mass Effect
upgrade_condition_masseffect.description: A single Direct condition attack can target up to your Tier in enemies simultaneously. Suffers a -Tier penalty to Condition rolls.

upgrade_condition_collateralcondition.name: Collateral Condition
upgrade_condition_collateralcondition.description: A successful condition triggers the attack against all targets within a 3-space burst.

requirements.display: Cannot apply to AOE attacks, and triggers only once per attack.

upgrade_condition_contagious.name: Contagious
upgrade_condition_contagious.description: A successful condition triggers the attack against the nearest enemy. Can chain up to Tier/2 times (rounded down) per attack.

upgrade_condition_cursed.name: Cursed
upgrade_condition_cursed.description: If 2 × (Condition roll - Resistance) is greater than or equal to the target's remaining HP, the condition becomes permanent.

upgrade_condition_overwhelmingaffliction.name: Overwhelming Affliction
upgrade_condition_overwhelmingaffliction.description: If your Condition roll exceeds the target's Resistance by 3 × Tier, the condition becomes permanent regardless of the target's HP.

upgrade_specialized_heavystrike.name: Heavy Strike
upgrade_specialized_heavystrike.description: Expend all Movement and one Quick Action to charge, adding +3×Tier to Damage and Condition rolls, but -Tier to Accuracy rolls.

upgrade_specialized_quickstrikes.name: Quick Strikes
upgrade_specialized_quickstrikes.description: Expend all Movement and one Quick Action to charge, allowing you to make the same Melee attack three times against a single target, but with a -Tier penalty to Accuracy rolls.

upgrade_specialized_whirlwindstrike.name: Whirlwind Strike
upgrade_specialized_whirlwindstrike.description: A single Melee attack targets up to your Tier in enemies simultaneously, but with a -Tier penalty to Accuracy rolls.

upgrade_specialized_headshot.name: Headshot
upgrade_specialized_headshot.description: Expend all Movement and one Quick Action to charge, adding +3×Tier to Damage and Condition rolls, but -Tier to Accuracy rolls.

upgrade_specialized_barrage.name: Barrage
upgrade_specialized_barrage.description: Expend all Movement and one Quick Action to charge, allowing you to make the same Ranged attack three times against a single target, but with a -Tier penalty to Accuracy rolls.

upgrade_specialized_scattershot.name: Scatter Shot
upgrade_specialized_scattershot.description: A single Ranged attack targets up to your Tier in enemies simultaneously, but with a -Tier penalty to Accuracy rolls.

upgrade_specialized_flurryofblows.name: Flurry of Blows
upgrade_specialized_flurryofblows.description: Make the same attack three times against a single target, with a -Tier penalty to Accuracy, Damage, and Condition rolls. Works with Melee or Ranged attacks.

upgrade_specialized_pounce.name: Pounce
upgrade_specialized_pounce.description: Move up to 6 spaces in a straight line toward the target as part of the attack. This movement occurs during the attack resolution.

upgrade_specialized_splinter.name: Splinter
upgrade_specialized_splinter.description: Defeating an enemy triggers another attack against a new target before your turn ends. Can chain up to Tier/2 additional attacks (rounded up).

upgrade_specialized_menacing.name: Menacing
upgrade_specialized_menacing.description: Reducing an enemy to 0 HP allows an Intimidation attempt against all enemies within 3 spaces of the target. Enemies with HP less than or equal to your Intimidation bonus will surrender.

upgrade_specialized_disengage.name: Disengage
upgrade_specialized_disengage.description: A successful hit prevents opportunity attacks from all hit targets until the end of your turn.

upgrade_specialized_extraattack.name: Extra Attack
upgrade_specialized_extraattack.description: A successful hit with a successful effect allows an identical attack against the same target. Must succeed on both Accuracy and Effect. Can only occur once per turn.

upgrade_specialized_analyzingstrike.name: Analyzing Strike
upgrade_specialized_analyzingstrike.description: +1 to a chosen stat (Accuracy/Damage/Conditions) for each previous Analyzing Strike against the same target. The bonus is capped at your Tier and resets if you skip attacking the target for one turn or activate it on another target.

upgrade_specialized_followupstrike.name: Follow-Up Strike
upgrade_specialized_followupstrike.description: A successful hit with a successful effect allows one Base Attack against the same target. Can only occur once per turn.

upgrade_specialized_counterattack.name: Counterattack
upgrade_specialized_counterattack.description: Using an attack against an enemy that missed you or failed their effect against you adds your Tier to a chosen roll (Accuracy, Damage, or Condition, selected at purchase).

upgrade_specialized_exploit.name: Exploit
upgrade_specialized_exploit.description: +Tier to Damage and Condition rolls against targets currently afflicted by any Condition.

upgrade_specialized_prioritytarget.name: Priority Target
upgrade_specialized_prioritytarget.description: After hitting a target, mark them as the Priority Target until the start of your next turn. Other characters gain a Tier/2 Accuracy bonus (rounded up) against this target. Can only be used once per turn.

upgrade_specialized_bully.name: Bully
upgrade_specialized_bully.description: Damaging a target with a Power score equal to or less than yours allows you to force a 1-space movement.

upgrade_specialized_martialartist.name: Martial Artist
upgrade_specialized_martialartist.description: Critical hits allow you to choose to apply Grab, a 3-space forced movement, or the Prone condition.

upgrade_specialized_grappler.name: Grappler
upgrade_specialized_grappler.description: Deal +Tier damage against targets you have Grabbed.

upgrade_variable_minionslayer.name: Minion Slayer
upgrade_variable_minionslayer.description: Choose Accuracy, Damage, or Condition when purchasing. Bonus applies against enemies with 10 maximum HP.

upgrade_variable_captainslayer.name: Captain Slayer
upgrade_variable_captainslayer.description: Choose Accuracy, Damage, or Condition when purchasing. Bonus applies against enemies with 25 maximum HP.

upgrade_variable_eliteslayer.name: Elite Slayer
upgrade_variable_eliteslayer.description: Choose Accuracy, Damage, or Condition when purchasing. Bonus applies against enemies with 50 maximum HP.

upgrade_variable_bossslayer.name: Boss Slayer
upgrade_variable_bossslayer.description: Choose Accuracy, Damage, or Condition when purchasing. Bonus applies against enemies with 100 maximum HP.

upgrade_variable_luckystrike.name: Lucky Strike
upgrade_variable_luckystrike.description: Using an Effort on this attack allows you to roll an extra die on the Effort roll.

upgrade_variable_compressedrelease.name: Compressed Release
upgrade_variable_compressedrelease.description: If you have an active Aura ability, you can disable it until the start of your next turn to add +Tier to your Accuracy, Damage, and Condition rolls.

upgrade_variable_domain.name: Domain
upgrade_variable_domain.description: If you have an active Barrier ability, gain +Tier to a chosen roll when attacking targets within your Barrier. Select Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing.

upgrade_variable_towerdefense.name: Tower Defense
upgrade_variable_towerdefense.description: If you have an active Wall ability, gain +Tier to a chosen roll when attacking targets on the opposite side of your Wall. Select Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing.

upgrade_variable_channeled.name: Channeled
upgrade_variable_channeled.description: For Ranged or AOE attacks. Spend your Primary Action + Movement on subsequent turns to repeat the attack. Gain +Tier to a chosen roll for each consecutive turn channeling (maximum 5 turns). Select Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing.

upgrade_variable_focused.name: Focused
upgrade_variable_focused.description: For Melee attacks. Spend your Primary Action + Movement on subsequent turns to repeat the attack. Gain +Tier to a chosen roll for each consecutive turn focusing (maximum 5 turns). Select Accuracy, Damage, or Conditions when purchasing.

pc.title: Player Character Creation
pc.description: Essential questions for creating your Player Character heir to the Rogue Trader dynasty.

questions.question: What drives your desire to inherit the dynasty's warrant of trade?
options: Legacy Builder - To create something that will outlast you.
Power Seeker - To crave authority and influence.
Duty Bound - To carry on the dynasty's mission.
Survivor - To gain the protection and resources leadership provides.
Idealist - To use the dynasty's power to make the Imperium better.

questions.question: What is your bond with the Rogue Trader, Dame Venecia?
options: The Loyal Retainer - Served from her Knight House days, bound by a blood debt from Cadia.
The Ambitious Partner - Joined her early on, splitting risks and rewards as equals.
The Reluctant Ally - A recent recruit with a hidden agenda, bound by mutual necessity.
The Shared Visionary - You both work toward the same long-term goal for the Imperium.

questions.question: Which aspect of the warrant's mandate do you most want to accomplish?
options: Supply Line Establishment - To maintain supply lines in the most dangerous regions.
Asset Recovery & Cleansing - To cleanse corruption and salvage assets from lost territories.
Technology Acquisition - To acquire Warp-resistant tech and psyker artifacts for the Crusade.
Military Recruitment - To build elite forces from Warp exposure survivors and unsanctioned psykers.

questions.question: What drove you to leave your previous life?
options: Ambition Unfulfilled - Your talents exceeded what your previous station could offer.
Scandal or Disgrace - A failure, betrayal, or forbidden act forced you from your former life.
Loyalty Transferred - You followed someone into exile or discovered a more worthy cause.
Necessity - War, corruption, or upheaval left you no choice but to seek new purpose.

questions.question: How do you handle authority and moral compromises?
options: Respect hierarchy, refuse compromise - You follow Imperial doctrine absolutely.
Question authority, small compromises for greater good - You bend rules when lives hang in the balance.
Challenge authority, pragmatic solutions - You prioritize results over protocol.
Ignore authority unless beneficial - You serve your own interests first.

questions.question: How do others see you?
options: Reliable and trustworthy - Colleagues depend on your word and competence.
Dangerous but useful - Others fear your methods but recognize your effectiveness.
Ambitious and driven - People see your hunger for advancement and achievement.
Mysterious and unpredictable - You keep your thoughts hidden and actions surprise others.

Debt-Bound Right Hand - Life-saver who handles practical operations.
Secret-Sharing Conscience - Dangerous knowledge binds you; keeps you grounded.

questions.question: What is this NPC's personal drive and motivation?
options: The Protector - Motivated by safeguarding something precious.
The Seeker - Pursues something lost, hidden, or forbidden.
The Builder - Works toward creating something lasting.
The Survivor - Driven by need to escape their past or outlive enemies.
The Faithful - Serves a higher cause or promise to someone important.

options: Contact/Ally - Someone who provides information or assistance.
Rival/Enemy - An antagonist or competing interest.
Family Member - Related to a PC but not directly involved in operations.
Organization Representative - Speaks for a faction, guild, or institution.
Background Character - Fills out the world but has limited direct involvement.

Imperial Navy - Fleet officers and void-born crews.
Astra Militarum - Imperial Guard regiments and commanders.
Adeptus Ministorum - Ecclesiarchy priests and missionaries.
Inquisition - Inquisitors, acolytes, and their agents.
Noble Houses - Planetary governors and aristocratic families.
